content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the porch.  it was a block/band of light that came out of the sky.  the light reached up into the sky into perpetuity. i could not see anything creating the beam but it was coming from a great distance.  the light was a rectangle like band.  it had edges to it and it lit up what it was landing on but it did not have any "overflow".  meaning it did not put off any additional light in the area, the light was "solid".  it only lit up exactly what it was on and it was completely dark outside of the edges of the light. the beam suddenly appeared across the street on top of a house and went straight up into what seemed like to space.  it moved across the top of house onto the driveway, then onto the street. it moved at quick right angles as if it were a spot light but like i said it was rectangular, solid and it had distinct edges. it moved across the street, into the neighbors trees.  it moved onto my deck about 6 -8 feet away. it was there for about 2 seconds and then moved onto the top of my roof.  once it moved onto my roof, i stood up and moved to the other side of the porch so i could see it on the roof.  it stayed illuminated for a few seconds and then just turned off.  i sat back down wondering what i had just seen.  all of the sudden i realized that it was brighter on my deck than it should be.  i looked down and i could see lite and shadows moving around on my porch around and under the chair next to me.  i looked under the chair and there was a lite that was spinning. it was about 1 1/2 feet tall and 6 -7 inches wide and it was like a cylindrical tin candle lantern but it was not solid, it was just a soft lite that was emanating a pattern like what a tin candle lantern would cast. it rotated slowly.  i looked at it for a few - 10 second not really believing my eyes. suddenly i realized that i was actually seeing what i was seeing and it was really there.  i suddenly began to feel a very intense feeling of fear.  i went into the house, locked the door and went in and wrote down in my journal exactly what i had seen so i would not forget it.  my first reasonable thought was that i was seeing a reflection off of satellite, but the light was not a normal type of light beam.  and then there was the spinning light on my porch.  has anyone ever reported something like this?
content.summary: Not a ufo it was a block of light

content.detailedDescription:
I was working mot road work and saw this ufo. im serious a shining shape in a clear sky 
we were working on state road 80 and we looked up and out of no where a shining ufo was right above us moving slowly...Then it disappeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We were working on state road 80 and we looked up and out of no where a shining ufo was right above us moving slowly...Then it disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs down to the auglaize river behind my home to play and go swimming.In the previous days to this event i had thought to myself how it would be cool to have another ufo sighting as i had seen a sighting in years.I got my phone out was taking pictures of the dogs and the rivers to post on my facebook i took a picture of the sun to see what my camera would do.After looking at the pictures to post on facebook i noticed that there was another object besides the sun picture.It was easy to see as the first picture turned out kind of dark.And the next picture you can see that the object at about 10 o'clock from the sun had moved a little bit higher in the sky into the cloud.These first two photos were taken last week maybe midweek.I've been waiting since then for a nice clear day to take more photos of the sun to see if there would be anything there.On my way home from work on the 15th.I stop by the grocery to get some stuff for dinner.The sun was directly in front of me with a clear sky as i exited the car i pointed the camera at the sun and took 3 photos seconds apart.Examining the photos on the 16th the first photo there was nothing there.The second photo you can see the object just next to the pointy cloud on the right at about 2 o'clock from the sun.In the third photo the object is left of the sun at about the 10 o'clock position.It still has an aura.Just before leaving the car to take the pictures and going to the grocery store i said to myself and to the object that may be there that i wish it was there so i could get more pictures of it and share with the public.It almost seems like it heard me asking requesting it to be there as it moved in after my second photo and third photo. which i thought was pretty cool. this object could not be seen with the naked eye as the sun light will blind you looking towards the sun it was only visible to the camera in the photos.
content.summary: All i could see is what was on my photos as i was looking into to the sun and was blinded by the light of the sun by taking the picture of the sun with my camera then the object appeared in the photo

content.detailedDescription:
Walked out on my porch to try and relax. all my life i've had issues with sleeping. on this date i went on to my front porch to enjoy the cool night and beautiful sky. i looked up after feeling what seemed to be a sound of power lines ( light buzz ) and a hair raising static. i saw the stars, and as i looked closer i noticed that the stars where disappearing in a tri-angle shape. the shape covered what appeared to be 300"x300"x300". the object was traveling very slow to. the west from the direction of tyndall air force base. the craft had lights at all three corners that were pulsating at a very slow and dim light/rate. it only was for a couple of minute, but it was real. 
 i was not scared, nervous, or frightened. i felt the feeling of peace and comfort. over the years, d/t my job i kept this to myself, but, now i hope that this will aid in what ever this is.
 over the past 30 pluse years this issue has haunted me, i still watch the sky.
 thanks in advance,
 [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Saw w/b over house no noise felt like power lines, buzz with slight vibration. lights were very dim and pulsed very slowly, craft was hudge no sound, 20-30feet  thick with unlit  windows.

content.detailedDescription: Middletown missouri, standing on porch we thought it was fireflies. to large and solid green. fast movements then slowed. flew 3ft from us, i have witnessed these last summer, they hoover in woods behind my lake and fly above the lake. my husband saw them and couldn't identify object, he is an avid outdoors-man knows all living creatures. i just thought oh they are back again and walked back int the house.
content.summary: Green orbs, have been here before. hovering and come very close to my home. husband witnessed and he dosent acknowledge this stuff, he is an avid outsdoorsman / hunter could say what these things were.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on (southeast facing)deck at residence just after dusk in the early part of june 2014.  i was watching sky looking for a satellite that i have seen on other occasions.  it would pass overhead from se to nw.  i would usually see it at about the same time (2100 or so).   i did not make a habit of looking for it but had seen it maybe six times previously.  sometime after 2100 hours on the evening in question, i observed what i believed to be the same satellite at about 60 degrees from south horizon traveling se to nw.  the sky was clear at the time.  the object was about as bright as the planet venus and about the same size, maybe slightly larger.  as i watched, the object, at about 80 degrees from horizon, stopped and stayed stationary.  after about 30 seconds, it started making radical changes in direction, zigzagging and looping at a rate that no aircraft could possibly achieve.  the maneuvers were only within one or two minutes of angle around the spot it had stopped.  after a time, maybe one minute or so, it continued on its trajectory.  it disappeared over the roof of the house.  i went to the front (north side) of the house and reacquired visual of it.  at about 90 degrees, the object stopped again and began to maneuver as before.  my neighbors were out and i pointed it out to them  i also got my wife and granddaughter outside and they saw it too.  after an indeterminate time (1-2 minutes), it stopped and then reversed course, going back on its original trajectory to the se.  i went back to the south side of the house after the object was obscured by the house..  the others quit watching at this time.  back on the south side of the house, i reacquired visual on the object and watched it until it was hidden by clouds moving into the area.  it had made no more maneuvers but continued on a straight trajectory nw/se.

the object's maneuvers to me were suggestive of the way someone would use a laser pointer to tease a cat, but with a much more limited area of movement.  projecting the area of maneuvering to scale, i would estimate the area of maneuvering to be the size of a silver dollar held at arm's length, maybe 1-2 minutes of angle.  i was unable to tell the distance of the object but would estimate it was very high, probably even orbital. i called duluth iap atc tower to tell them what i had seen.  unknown if they entered the call into a log or if the conversation was recorded.  haven't seen object or satellite again, but i really haven't looked that hard.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Satellite appearing on trajectory se/nw.  stopped and changed directuion numerous times.  restarted trajectory, then reversed course.

content.detailedDescription: Was in the park across the canal from shoreline village in long beach about hour before sunset. saw two silver discs moving from se to nw. had my camera and as i focused they suddenly changed direction toward ne an up. then flashed out of view. got one clear photo that i took showing 1 disc and the flash of the other disappearing. i felt amazed but totally forgot about it until days later when i got the film developed. i then forgot again until years later going thru old photos i found it again and scanned it in.
content.summary: Across the canal from shoreline village saw two silver discs moving from se to nw then changed dir to ne disappeared in flash

content.detailedDescription:
This event took place in 1966. i believe it was in june in los angeles, ca.
i was watching a regularly scheduled tv program on ktla? called fyi. the host was tom frandsen. he had an us airforce general? on who showed what looked like "commercial" side views, front views, top views of saucer shaped vehicles. the way they were shown was similar to a series of marketing photos taken by, say boeing, to advertise their commercial planes during the day light. they were very clear photos. i couldn't believe my eyes and have never forgotten the show even after all these years. i thought, "finally we know". there is the proof. i would really like to know what i saw. the general said they were to meet the "people" (ets) in the peruvian andes that year and it would either be the greatest discovery of the century or a hoax. i know that thousands of viewers saw the same thing that i did. i have never heard another thing and would like you to investigate it. maybe they still have the recording of the show.
content.summary: Commercial-type photographs of top, side, etc. shown on tv in 1966

content.detailedDescription: When i left a building at 2am or so i looked to the sky over the elizabeth river and hovering above it was a cylinder glowing orange and i thought it to be hot because of the color ---- it did nothing but hover there.  i got in my car and drove away.  that is all i have to say.
content.summary: Cyllender orange glowing hovering above the elizabeth river

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of may 10, 2015, my friend annie 
pointed out the strange object she had seen the 
night before in the western sky over indian shores, 
florida. i used my camera to zoom in closer to see 
what it was, and realized i had to record it. 

we were on the 4th floor balcony of our condo. annie had noticed the object 2 nights earlier and called me outside to see it as it appeared again. i lost sight of the object as it travelled so far away from us we didn;t see it anymore.
content.summary: Hexagon shaped, with white outline, looked like tv static inside, changed colors, travelledquickly when it went away.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and my dad adverted me about a "giant flash of light" it remained for 6 hours at my sight comunicating me telepatically or something like. it s not the first time i see ufo in fact the second time it was orange yellow i send photos of the blue first encounter and the second time. i also saw a triangular ufo (metallic this time ) few months ago
content.summary: The object mutaformed from a cigar to a ball like to other things

content.detailedDescription: Walking our from my moms home on a dark clear night. i was admiring how clear the night sky was and all the stars that were showing. then noticed this star that was brighter the others moving faster the a satellite, then it really took off to the n, stopped dead then zipped to the e, ne, and then stopped dead. then zipped s, and then west, at the time i knew nothing in our military that was able to move like that. all happen in less then 3 seconds and i willing to put money on it that the craft covered hundreds of miles or even 1000 of miles within that 3 seconds. after seeing this i was stunned of a second and saying to myself, hmmm i think i just saw my first ufo, i am open to other forms of live in our universe but never thought i would ever see something that would confirm the real possibility, but i did.
content.summary: Never seen a star or satellite move like i saw that night

content.detailedDescription:
The incident happened if i remember correctly, in november of 1987. i had returned from my then girlfriends house around midnight. i was laying down in my driveway smoking a cigarette looking up at a clear, cool sky when some red lights directly above me caught my attn. there were 6 red lights spinning slowly in a circular pattern hovering in one spot. i knew, no-one would ever believe this so i ran inside and woke my father up. he came outside it the object was still there! he was just as clueless as to what was hovering above our house. my layman's guess was the object was 400+ feet above the ground. it made no sound or gave off any type of emission. as we were discussing the object, we looked back up and it was totally gone. my father was a pharmacist and didn't believe in bigfoot or ufo's. till the day he passed away, he couldn't explain what we saw that night. i will never forget that night. i have seen hundreds...Of videos of camera footage of ufo's. only once, did i see the object that resembled what we saw that night. i swear on my good fathers grave, the incident i have described did in fact happen just as described. you may contact me in any way. 

best regards, [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Witnessed circular object hovering with red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
My companion and i both saw a boomerang configuration of 5 to 7 round glowing lights in the very dark sky above us on one side of the highway. the lights were traveling in a se direction and continued to do that for the duration of the sighting. since our car continued in a se direction, i concluded that the lights must be as well, since we would have passed them if they had not also been moving.

the lights were round, with irregular edges and glowing a bright white. we observed them for about 15 minutes before they all disappeared at the same time. they didn't fly off, they just disappeared instantly at the same time. we did not know if they were one large object or a configuration of smaller objects. i describe it as a boomerang shape, but if it was one large object then it could have been banking or switching lights off and on to create the illusion of a boomerang shape.

the configuration changed about 3 times by having a light disappear from the longer arm of the boomerang and instantly appear on the shorter arm. in the blink of an eye, the longer arm became shorter while simultaneously the shorter arm became one light longer than before.

we heard no sound, smelled nothing, or saw or heard any plane or helicopter etc. during or after the sighting. it did not land, change direction or have any discernible characteristics other than the white glowing light shapes in a boomerang configuration.

upon first sighting the lights, i checked my rearview mirror, had my companion roll down her window closest to the lights and made all efforts to rule out reflections from highway lights or anything common that would account for the lights appearing to be in the sky above us. there were no variables to account for this sighting.

i wanted to stop but my companion was extremely afraid and trembling so i kept driving at a slower speed while observing the lights. my companion readily acknowledged seeing the lights but did not want to talk about it at the time or later. years later, when i asked her if she remembered what we saw, she said yes and described the lights with no prompting, but still did not want to discuss it. 

my reaction was not fear but amazement, as i'd never seen or even heard of anything to account for what we were seeing. in my excitement, i did jokingly ask my companion if we stopped, would she want to contact whatever it was in the sky. she become very agitated and alarmed and loudly said, no--so i assured her that wouldn't happen and that i was just joking. she said it was not funny and she wanted to get away from the lights. she remained tense and nervous and i remained amazed even after they disappeared.

to my knowledge, nothing has happened to either of us, in the intervening years since the sighting, that seems connected to it.

note: unable to submit report until i clicked on landing material as "unknown" and landing soil/vegetation as "unknown" when i had previously said that there was no landing.
content.summary: Saw large boomerang shape of round lights flying in a straight path that changed shape.

content.detailedDescription: Spotted triangle ufo in bangalore. black triangle with no sound and plasma ball kind of sphere below it glowing with multiple colours. it was very near to me. attached the sketch of the same.
content.summary: Triangle ufo spotted in bangalore india.

content.detailedDescription: On 9/11/2011 a friend and i were hunting on property that borders vafb. we were in the field at 3am trying to pattern the hogs. as i was scanning around i saw lights glowing from behind a hill. i thought it was a vehicle coming my way but something didn't seem right. when the lights came into view there was one and then one slightly behind it to the left. a couple seconds later as they moved closer another came in from the right and they formed a triangle. as it moved closer a cone shaped beam moved back and forth coming from the middle one. suddenly the one in the middle came quickly towards me and stopped which really freaked me out. it began to change colors white red and greenish blue, and almost seemed like i could reach out and touch it. when i looked back for the other two lights, there was only one. then it amazingly fast streaked out of sight to the right. the one that came towards me occasionally moved a little left or right or up or down until sunrise then i couldn't see it.
content.summary: Three seperate lights coming together in triangle then leaving seperatly

content.detailedDescription: The date is a guess since it happened some time ago. my sister had gone to the store at around 9 pm in the evening on or about april 1996. after a short time she returned home, yelling for me to come outside. when i did, i saw a green beam of light shining around my neighbors yard. the beam was an intense cone shaped light. it was approximately 100 yards from where i stood in my driveway. it lite up my neighbors front and side yard. the beam was intense more like a laser light than normal light. the beam was about 30 feet in diameter. i could not see a source of the light. i could not see a craft. there was no sound. two cars had stopped on the paved road, staying out of the light, as if they were watching it. after about 10 minutes, the light disappeared. i was so excited and shocked that i called the local airforce base, and asked to speak with the duty officer. i asked if there were any maneuvers in progress with the military. i was told there was none. i asked if there were any helicopters in the area. i was told no. i thanked them and hung up the phone.
content.summary: My sister saw a light on her way home. shortly before turning into our driveway, she saw a bright beam of light.

content.detailedDescription: ;i was looking at the night sky thinking how can it be so beautiful and humans be so evil. the stars appeared i blinked my porch light they increased their brightness. i'd ask questions they'd move up down side to side in response. till the small stars came down by the hundreds.Then things changed. the v shaped rainbows.The funnel cloud landings.Go to my facebook page and see some of the pics. or better yet google my address and to the left of the house you'll see a white patch.They're mining something.
content.summary: 3 stars in a triangle formation the largest bright white the one to the left pinkish the one on the right yellowish. this started in march they'd appeared about 8pm leave about 4am. when they finally landed it was dec 23 on the east side of the lake

content.detailedDescription: My house and i was sleeping when i heard some noises so i walked outside and saw the alien on my roof. there were a lot of blinking red lights and bells. the minute i saw it, i knew it was a ufo because i felt it's presents. it approached my chimney and then left when it noticed me. i had a feeling of joy. it flew away with its bells ringing and it was pulled away by thirteen fury aliens./
content.summary: Alien promised to be back next year

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting at around 9pm on my balcony when i saw a bright cloud. all of a sudden the cloud shot a silver bright orb that moved so fast it looked like a huge bullet and it was headed towards a lightning storm. it was too fast to catch a photo and was completely silent.
content.summary: Silver orb shot out of a cloud going almost light speed towards a lightning storm

content.detailedDescription:
At work - outside the ferry terminal - with a colleague and several costumers we watched a red/orange object "slowly" flying from east to west without a noise.  it was flying against the wind. it vanished after about 3 minutes.

the year before - on 2012/05/25 at night we saw another bright white object flying from east to west too.
content.summary: Red/orange very bright light

content.detailedDescription: My very good friend [name removed]  came over to my house to stay the night.We carried a large mattress to lay on my homes open patio to sleep out in the warm summer air with a beautiful view of a clear starry night, we talked a lot for hours. at possibly around 1 a.M. we were quiet and looking at the view of stars above us seeing a few satellites every now and then.Suddenly a very large bright light appeared directly above us and projected a beam surrounding both of us. i saw kevin in my peripheral vision with a contorted face appearing to scream but no sound i then focused on the light my face contorted tried to scream but no sound. it went black next thing i remember it was morning.We never have talked about this incident,ever,
content.summary: Large bright object appeared about 100ft. above us

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:40, 05-15-2015, i was taking a trash bag to the main trash can in the front of my dad's house. after closing the lid, i turned and noticed 3 glowing lights moving slowly above the neighbors tree line but below the clouds. i listened for noise, but heard nothing. i knew that if they were helicopters or planes that they would have a red and/or green light on them. there were no red or green lights on any of them. they weren't flares either because they remained at the same altitude for the duration of the sightings. about a minute after this, 3 more lights appear from behind the trees. they were pretty much in a line with some of them fairly close to each other. this is when i knew i had to get my brother to get his opinion. i felt sure that i was observing ufos. i never took my eyes off them. i knocked on his bedroom window and returned to where i was standing when i first saw these orbs. when he came outside all i did was point in the direction of the lights. by this time several more lights appeared, all coming out of the southeast and moving to the northeast. there was a slight curve in their forward movement. at one point 4 of these orbs were fairly close together. we discussed that we would have heard something because they were close to each other. absolutely no sound came from any of them. this lasted for approximately 20 minutes. i also took photos with my cell phone. 

after the last one was no longer in sight, i called the local police department to find out if they had received any calls from anyone else that might have seen them. the dispatcher stated no calls had been received. she asked for my name and address, which i gave to her. i also told her that i had taken photos of the lights. she asked if i wanted an officer to come out and talk to us and see the photos. i said sure. we ended the call. 20 minutes later my cell phone rang. it was a police officer informing me that they did in fact get a couple of phone calls from individuals that saw the lights. he then stated that the lights were helicopters going out to the gulf of mexico for oil rig crew changes. wrong!!! first of all, the orbs were traveling to the northeast. the gulf of mexico is to the south. secondly, petroleum helicopters inc.(phi) does not send 20+ helicopters at a time for crew changes. i know this because my brother worked for phi. if they would have been helicopters they would not have flown in the pattern that we observed. and with that many of them we would have heard them. i didn't want to argue with this policeman. he insulted me and that was wrong of him to say what he said. his ending words to me were 'no policeman will be sent out to talk to us or to see the photos.' my feelings about this are excitement. i never felt frightened. actually, i would have totally loved it if they would have landed near me. i never miss your programs and feel that you have given me the knowledge to know the difference between aircraft from this planet and aircraft from another world.

i know that the attached photos are not the best. but i have seen in your programs that you can do amazing things to enlarge the objects involved.

thank you for your programs and having this website to report sightings. i would gladly discuss this further with you.
content.summary: Observed 20+ white/reddish orange orbs moving from southeast to northeast

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch smoking a cig with my x gf observing the percieds meteor shower observing many brilliant shooting stars the evening we were hungry to go out and gaze to the heavens again and had already made five or six trips outside. as we sat we both observed what appeared to be huge meteor traveling at the highest rate of speed i have ever seen. i estimate 5 to 10 times the speed of sound. i got the feeling the object was spinning like a top i was in the army airborne infantry i estimate the length of the object to be 400m - 700m long and 300 - 450m wide or tall. it was a fat disk in shape dark in color the object left two distinct trails of orange flame as it tore through the atmosphere angular /==== starting from the leading edge of the top edge 150m tall trailing 1700m and dissipating into nothing an equal and opposite trail \==== that started from the leading edge of the bottom of the meteor in tandem. vividly i recall that their was no trail whatsoever directly behind the object as it hurtled past only blackness which still to me makes no sense. in awe and shock moments maybe 45 seconds we stood is dumbfounded silence finally i swallowed and asked my x, "did you see that too?" she closed her mouth and mumbled out a "yes" and we spoke at length at what we had witnessed and the horror of the thought of what would have happened if that huge spinning rock had struck our world straight on instead on merely near missing our earth... it would have been catastrophic and to be honest i have never felt so small and insignificant a few hundred feet lower and i would have been atomized with hundreds of thousands of others. the object flew in a solely southern flight path and to the best of my knowledge it flew perfectly horizontal and exited back into space. i would also like to say that though it had a fire-trail the object was not burning up disintegrating or affected by our atmosphere whatsoever. and also it brought to my attention that their are gigantic objects in space moving unfathomably fast moving around us that we as a race have no clue about. i dont go out and look during meteor showers anymore not that im scared or anything i just had my fill of them thank you. as a footnote i wanted to to express that a giant meteor was in my opinion without a doubt killed the dinosaurs and i don't like to say it but i feel as collective life on earth will befalling a similar demise in the upcoming years from the perceids.
content.summary: Sitting on back porch third floor looking west with my xgf we saw huge meteor so close to earth

content.detailedDescription: While carpooling with mom and dad through east helena, dad saw it first coming in from the south. he points it out, and we think it's a plane. i found the light configuration was odd, being four bright white lights splitting the object into thirds. the span between the two lights at the ends was about the wingspan of a 747. i noticed that the lights were in a slight arc formation, as if they were on an invisible wing. there wasn't any blinking, no red or green, or any regulatory anti-collision lights, just the four whites. the object arced westward, by then i figured it was making a landing at the airport. instead it increases speed, crossing the entire valley within a second. there were no booms, or flashing indicating a sonic boom. i would say the way it zipped off was sort of like it was magnetic. everyone in our vehicle couldn't stop talking. dad remains skeptical, mom is indifferent, i am left shaken with excitement with the encounter. we were too excited to take pictures on our phones.
content.summary: Leaves from radio tower hill, arcs westward, crossed the entire valley within a second.

content.detailedDescription:
We arrived at our farm approximately 4am, my friend,2 sons and i were stretching outside from just arriving outside of our truck, getting ready to head to our deer stands. when three of us me and sons were looking up to see all the stars on that clear winter cold nightsky when suddenly in the tops of the empty 15 foot trees, a ball of light the size of a large grapefruit lit up the non leaved tree brances it was right above for about 30 seconds, then suddenly moved across our 40.Acre field, when halfway across it blinked out suddenly same it came on.
jason
content.summary: Me friend and 2 sons deer-hunting arriving 3 minutes glowing light turned on and lit tree branches-up front of us then moved level across fields then blinked-off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was maybe 11-12 with my nephew who was 3 years younger. we were at our camp in cornell, mi (rural area). i had climbed into the top bunk w/him so we could look out the window-the bed was lengthwise against the window and when we lay down we were at eye level with the window. we see a light above the trees way off in the distance. at first we think it's a star, but then it gets brighter, then dimmer. we don't know what to think. we get caught up in being kids and not paying attention for a few minutes, then when we look, it's closer and brighter and looks a little bigger. weird. what is that?? next time we look, it's way closer and it's pretty bright. omg. now we are getting scared. within a minute i swear the light was right outside the window and filled the window and room w/light. you never saw two kids jump off a bed so fast in your life. woke my dad up, and of course, he thought we were nuts. "get back to bed." we were scared and waited until he went in and checked it out and there was nothing there. needless to say, we slept in the bottom bunk. my nephew and i never spoke of it until about 8 years ago. i questioned him about it and asked him if he remembered that or did i just dream it. he said, "no. you did not dream that. that was crazy." i told him i wasn't sure i had ever been that scared in my life and he agreed. unfortunately, my nephew died just 5 years ago. so there is no one to corroborate my story.

but, my story doesn't end there. it seems i would be visited more than once. i used to see things all the time in the sky and it fascinated me. in 9th or 10th grade, my very best friend since 3rd grade slept at my house (again, in cornell). we both wake up in the morning with what felt like weird dreams. we were on opposite sides of the bed than we were when we went to bed. she actually remembered more than i did, and yes, i am still friends w/her. 

forward 10 years or so, i am married and have two children. i never spoke to my kids about ufos as i never wanted to frighten them, and i wasn't quite sure what to believe. my 8 year old son begins having what i first believed was nightmares. he would come screaming down the stairs saying, "mom, mom, there was a light in my window, and it was shining right at me."  i told him that it could have just been a car passing by and maybe light reflected into his room. this began to become an almost weekly (sometimes more) event. and it got worse. sometimes he swore he couldn't move and he felt like someone was with him. he would try to wake up his brother and he wouldn't wake up. eventually he started sleeping in his closet that was in between the two bedrooms upstairs. he did that for almost a year. he was terrified. i never told him i didn't believe him, but i would just tell him that we don't know what it is. i didn't believe he would be hurt. he continued to have these "nightmares" well into high school. i didn't want to believe it, but i think he may have been abducted. he is almost 30 now and he can hardly talk about it.

when david was around 12 or 13, his dad and i were going to a party about 5 miles from escanaba, mi (where we lived). on our way there i notice a light above this field. we both think maybe it's a star. it's still sort of light out. the light gets a little closer and it's hovering. it's not a saucer, but is like a layer cake. i had never seen anything like it in my life. multi colored lights all around. but it was cylindrical. my husband (now my ex) was excited. the object descended below the near tree line and looked like it was landing in the field. i don't believe it made a sound. he stopped the car!!! omg. i was terrified and told him to drive. he actually wanted to go and check it out. uh-uh. ain't happening. drive the car. of course, we get to the party and are so shook up by what we saw that we tell everyone there and they all think we are nuts. 

here's another interesting thing. my father (who was born in 1919) tells me he had encounters and has seen many unexplained ufos. he had been in the army, but i'm not sure what or when he saw things because he would never say more than that. so, my question is, have they been following three generations of us??? i told my son about your site here and i think he is still too traumatized to even want to think about it much. something happened to him when he was young. something that was very real to him. he was not a boy to make things up. he has graduated from law school and has a masters in human resources. but he still gets a little nervous talking about aliens. i thought i should get our story out there. we have no pictures or video. only our memories.

thanks for giving me a chance to get this out.

~marti (preferred)
content.summary: Hovering light above tree tops. it eventually, slowly came directly at us

content.detailedDescription: I was in farmersburg indiana and smoking a cigarette outside around midnight on my porch and i always look at the sky and star gaze and i saw a bright light but not blinding coming toward me and thought it was a helicopter flying at tree top level from the north to the south towards my house and then hovered for about a minute then shot up into the sky at a northeast at a 45 degree angle in a few seconds the light couldn't be seen.I was in awww no plain or anything that i know can zip threw the sky like that strait up into the sky i have seen jets from hulman airport and this was nothing from this earth.
content.summary: Bright light but not blindiing

content.detailedDescription: It was a normal day aroung 9-10pm i was driving with my brother in the passenger seat we were leaving buffalo wild wings in grandville michican when suddenly there was a flash of white light, we never saw anything but after the flash we both felt a little daized and confused. and our surroundings were kind of different. on the road at first there was some traffic and a police car that had pulled someone over and after the flash of light the road was clear and the cop car and the car that had been pulled over were gone, there was nothing around us and this time i had a witness, it was very bizarre. we were not sure what had happened we first thought we traveled through a worm hole or something. to this day we have no idea what happened but i suppose since i have seen many ufos it could have been an abduction.
content.summary: Flash of light

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
So since i lived in wa state as a kid to moving to tucson az and now in san diego, ca i have had many events. i don't really know what to say here. i am still a little afraid of what may happen since i seem to have seen the same  3-4 people everywhere i have lived. they do not seem to age either but i know for sure i have seen them before other places. it is actually pretty scary. i have also had events where i see a flash and it feels like time had stopped and pit me back into where i was, i just know it did but time always seems to be right. i even have dreams where i see et's and they talk in a language i have never heard mostly sounds i have never heard yet i know what is being said.
 i also see groups of numbers and dots in these dreams and i also know how to read them and they are always what the et is saying. sometimes the dreams are the same one and once i swear i even say one after i woke up. i am a grown man and after that one i slept with my lights on for over a week. one event has been documented in tucson and phoenix in 1997 i think. i really do not remember what time of year but i think it was late summer. as with most of all i have seen i tried not to think about it too much but now i kinda want to know why i am seeing these things and especially am having these dreams. i have never told anyone about this other than my mother, wife and brother. well, my oldest daughter as well. i am 100% serious about every thing i have seen and am telling you and even willing to submit ant kind of testing to prove so. i am not crazy or have any medical issues, i have always just been a little afraid due to things i have heard happens if you report this stuff. now though i would really like to find out why...Why did i see these? why do i have these dreams? why does it seem like people who never age have followed me? why does time flash and seem to stand still yet time is as it always was? i would love some answers. 
thank you for your time. oh ya ...In my dreams...The et's tell "earth time people" as they say as to what our future holds in time with them.
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Unknown, N/A
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: I have had a few and always been scared to say anything. from az to wa to ca. people following me it seems too
